models.name: Relationship
models.description: Represents the relationship between accounts, such as following / blocking / muting / etc.

fields.name: requested
fields.description: Do you have a pending follow request for this user?

fields.name: endorsed
fields.description: Are you featuring this user on your profile?

fields.name: followed_by
fields.description: Are you followed by this user?

fields.name: muting_notifications
fields.description: Are you muting notifications from this user?

fields.name: showing_reblogs
fields.description: Are you receiving this user's boosts in your home timeline?

fields.name: domain_blocking
fields.description: Are you blocking this user's domain?
